questions.question: Rockwell test utilizes ___________ a measure of hardness.

explanations.b: Rockwell test utilizes depth of indentation as a measure of hardness. It is done for the constant load. Time is specified.

questions.question: What is the apex angle of Rockwell cone indentor?

explanations.d: Rockwell hardness testing machine essentially consist of a supporting table for placing the specimen, a hand wheel to raise or lower the supporting table, a Rockwell ball indenter which is a hardened steel ball 1/6'' in diameter,a Rockwell cone indenter which is a diamond cone of 120Â°.
